root.name: Arcade Classics
root.description: The cartridge included:CentipedeUltrapongMissile CommandUltrapong was just titled "Pong" on the cover, and was based on the dedicated console release "Ultra Pong Doubles".Each game included a classic version (which weren't arcade perfect by any stretch of the imagination) and a "Genesis/Sega" version, which slightly enhanced the graphics and/or sound.
